name: places/ChIJjb3rhRdawokRWPWSVpJ8L28
formattedAddress: 33 Maiden Ln Front 2, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 33 Maiden Ln Front 2, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text: Greeted with smiles from the time you open the door till the time you leave. Everyone is so helpful, patient, & kind. Diane, Anna, & Dr. Nikki are the absolute BEST at what they do! And now they take my insurance, which makes things so much easier. The Cohen's on 33 Maiden Lane is a gem for me! Keep up the good work, ladies!!

text.text: Greeted with smiles from the time you open the door till the time you leave. Everyone is so helpful, patient, & kind. Diane, Anna, & Dr. Nikki are the absolute BEST at what they do! And now they take my insurance, which makes things so much easier. The Cohen's on 33 Maiden Lane is a gem for me! Keep up the good work, ladies!!

originalText.text:
DO NOT GO HERE! The eye doctor tested my eyes under 5 minutes, didn't do any other test besides ask me to read the lines on the wall. I have eye issues and wanted to ask questions, and he cut me off and told me he would walk me out. He was very rude. It  was the worst eye exam I have ever had, and I have been wearing glasses from 4th grade.
The staff wanted to sell me glasses, but I said I just wanted my prescription for my glasses, and they told me they would email it to me. I asked them if there was a copay, they told me no because my insurance would cover.
I have NEVER received an email with my eye prescription till this day. On top of that, the next day, someone calls me to tell me that I owe a copay for my contact fitting which I never requested, never did, as I do not wear contacts.
With that being said, I never received service or the prescription that my insurance paid for, and they try to charge for services that was not done!
I had to call my insurance and complain, and request for a 2nd opinion without cost due to that this place did NOT provided with the service requested.
I WILL NEVER GO THERE AGAIN!!!

originalText.text: Great Staff. I cut back a star because I didn’t care for Dr Marolla at all. First impressions and lack of greeting says a lot. There were little to no questions besides which line I can see on the chart and it felt like he was in a rush to get back to doing whatever he was doing before I came into the store. I of course had to take my contacts out for the exam, it didn’t seem like he was even going to give me a case until I asked. I thought that was very rude and rubbed me the wrong way. He rushed the exam completely without given me the time of day for a question. The staff on the other hand were wonderful and attentive and they asked and answered any questions I may have. If the staff had the same mood as the doctor, I definitely would’ve left.

originalText.text: Excellent service! Very fast and helpful. They have an awesome positive attitude.

text.text: Excellent service! Very fast and helpful. They have an awesome positive attitude.

originalText.text:
The Best service in NYC.  The team is professional, polite and prompt.  They are very knowledgeable on the products and extremely helpful.
Thanks to Fina, Diana, Dr Marolla and Alice who has an incredible memory.
